mapper.sql: id, study_paragraph, grade, version, label, picture_name, picture_url, course_name, status, create_time, update_time, delStatus
mapper.select:
select distinct c.version from sentence_course c, sentence_unit su, unit_sentence us where us.unit_id = su.id
and c.course_name like concat('%', concat(#{courseName}, '%'))
and c.id = su.course_id and c.id not in (select course_id from teacher_course_library where type = 2 and teacher_id = #{teacherId}) and c.study_paragraph = #{phase} order by c.version asc

select c.id, c.course_name courseName from sentence_course c, sentence_unit u, unit_sentence us where us.unit_id = u.id and c.id = u.course_id and c.version = #{version} and c.study_paragraph = #{phase} and c.id not in (select course_id from teacher_course_library where type = 2 and teacher_id = #{teacherId}) group by c.course_name
